grammar.treeinsertion

Class Lexicon

  • java.lang.Object
    • grammar.treeinsertion.Lexicon

  • public class Lexicon
extends java.lang.Object
    A recursive data structure for accessing efficiently several TIGRule's. Basically, it consists of a HashMap where all TIGRule's with a given String-key are stored. Because the TIGRule's can describe a chain of String's, the value associated with the first String-key is again a Lexicon-object.
    Author:
    Fabian Gallenkamp
